props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, the field is no longer editable and will not be saved

props.name: help
props.description: Optional help text below the field

props.name: label
props.description: A descriptive label for the field

props.name: name
props.description: A unique name for the input

props.name: required
props.description: If `true`, the field has to be filled in correctly to be submitted

props.name: autofocus
props.description: Sets the focus on this field when the form loads. Only the first field with this label gets

props.name: multiple
props.description: If false, only a single item can be selected
